title: Cold War World Political Map MCQ 4

content.question: All of the following contributed to the end of the political order depicted on the map EXCEPT

choices.label: the expansion of United States military spending
the unsuccessful Soviet military intervention in Afghanistan
continued economic weakness in the Soviet Union following Gorbachevâ€™s reforms
armed rebellions in Eastern European states against Soviet rule

content.answer: armed rebellions in Eastern European states against Soviet rule

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
